*** Settings ***
Test Template     Argument Should Be Accepted
Library           Remote    127.0.0.1:${PORT}
Library           Helper.py
Variables         variables.py

*** Variables ***
${PORT}           8270

*** Test Cases ***
String
    'Hello, world!'
    u'hyv\\xe4 \\u2603'
    ''

Integer
    0
    42
    -1

Float
    0.0
    3.14
    -0.5

Boolean
    True
    False

None
    None    ''

Binary data
    '\\x00\\x01\\xff'
    u'\\x00\\x01\\xff'    '\\x00\\x01\\xff'

Arbitrary object
    ${MyObject()}    '<MyObject>'

List
    \[]
    \['a', 'b', 'c']
    \['One', -2, False]
    \[None]    ['']
    \[['a', 'b'], 3, [[[4]]]]

Tuple
    ()    []
    ('a', 'b', 'c')    ['a', 'b', 'c']
    ('One', -2, False, (None,))    ['One', -2, False, ['']]

Dict
    {}
    {'one': 1, 'spam': 'eggs'}
    {None: None}    {'': ''}
    {'a': 0, 'b': True, 'c': {'x': [1, 2, 3]}}

Dict with non-string keys
    {1: 'a', 2: 3, (): ()}    {'1': 'a', '2': 3, '()': []}

Mapping
    ${MyMapping(a='one', b=2, c=[None, True])}    {'a': 'one', 'b': 2, 'c': ['', True]}

*** Keywords ***
Argument Should Be Accepted
    [Arguments]    ${argument}    ${expected}=${NONE}
    ${expected} =    Get Non None    ${expected}   ${argument}
    ${argument} =    Evaluate If String    ${argument}
    Argument Should Be    ${argument}    ${expected}
